name: Ethereal
description: Ethereal is a 3D platformer with "collect-a-thon" elements, featuring a psychedelic ambiance and a low poly cartoonish visual style. The player controls the character "Ego," who seeks to free himself from situations in his past lives to reach his final stage of enlightenment. To achieve this, he must collect orbs and special collectibles throughout the levels.

name: Manu
description: In Manu, the player controls Manu, a child who struggles to finish their homework. In this 2D platform adventure game, the player will encounter various challenges to help Manu break free from their thoughts and, despite everything, manage to complete their assignment.

name: Robbers in Disguise
description:
Put on your costume and go on a heist in unusual places with your friends!

Progress through puzzles, traps and unexpected situations using coordination and dexterity to complete your mission!

Robbers in disguise is a cooperatives party game at 4 players with multiple phases of action in an absurd tone.

The mechanics are mainly based on physics and environment. It’s played with a controller on an undivided screen.

name: Cards of Prophecy
description: Cards of Prophecy is a Tower Defense, Deckbuilder, Roguelike game, in which instead of using crossbows, mortars, etc., you will use your deck of cards to summon monsters or cast spells, which you will acquire during the game. Each game is different because the map is random (the cards interact with the map), and the cards you get during the game are also random, generating different strategies for each occasion. In addition, the cards and spells have synergies with each other, as well as upgrades that you acquire and that change the way you play the game. At the end of a game, you earn gold to buy card packs and thus improve your cards for the next game, and acquire new cards.

name: Sphex: Minimal Arcade Game
description:
SPHEX is a hard survival/runner game with arcade elements where your primary purpose is to try stay alive for as much time as possible. Things start off easy in a very simple game world, but they soon become more and more challenging as you try to run for your life.

Test your survival skill
You should move as fast as possible in order to avoid all the small red squares that are coming towards you. If you get hit a few times,

name: My Monsters
description:
My Monsters is a VR action-adventure game that stands out for its 100% hand-painted art, immersing players in a world of fantasy and surrealism. The game's deep narrative explores humanity's greatest inner monsters, such as anxiety, fear, and loneliness. The player is transported to the dream-like world of Onirium, where they meet Moti, a frightened little monster with no memory.

In My Monsters, you are not alone; team up with your inner monster, Moti, and face various enemies, solve complex puzzles, and overcome challenges side by side. This unique partnership mechanic allows players to deeply connect with Moti, using empathy and courage to overcome obstacles and discover fragments of a meaningful dreamlike tale. Each stage of the game reveals new aspects of this collaborative relationship, culminating in moments of self-discovery and profound understanding.

name: Guns Arcade: City Crisis VR
description: Guns Arcade is an OnRail Shooter Arcade Action game in Virtual Reality, where you have to stop the invasion of robots through highly destructible environments

name: C.A.P.I
description: This game was created using Unity for a Jam with the theme of Intellectual Property (IP), with the aim of teaching about the different types of IPs, as well as teaching how to identify problems involving them and how to act against them. In a fun and dynamic way, you will take on the role of a lawyer at a small firm specialized in evaluating these intellectual property issues.

name: Bilhetes e Boatos
description: "Bilhetes e Boatos" is a Visual Novel that simulates the daily life of a school like any other. Everything seems normal until mysterious notes and anonymous profiles start to appear. The tension increases more and more, and one question echoes in everyone's mind: Who is behind all of this? Play now and start your investigation!

name: Wario's Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Essence of Waluigi II: Eternal Awakening
description: One year after the events of Essence Of Waluigi, Mario & Luigi are knocked out. While they were sleeping, Waluigi brings back the Essence thanks to the help of a mysterious new partner. Soon, the Mario bros. wake up to find that Toad Town is in ruins. Along with that, a strange looking moon has started to travel towards the planet.

name: Target Pinball
description: Advergame for the supermarket

name: ZooPals Sea Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: ZooPals Mismatch Game
description: Sin descripción

name: ZooPals Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Sin descripción

name: PVKK: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant
description: Operate your planetary defense cannon to fend off an interplanetary invasion from the comfort of your cozy bunker. You’re here to stay, so obey your superiors, press the right buttons, and sip your daily tea ration - it's good for you.

name: Bowser Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Robinsons: Play the Game with Tim Henman
description: Cross-promotional LCD game for Robinsons fruit drink and Wimbledon athlete Tim Henman

name: Woodlands Junior School Pokemon Journey
description: Rudimentary Pokémon text adventure fangame, made by Mark E, a student at a British school, in the late 90s to early 2000s.

name: Frozen Fruits
description:
Frozen Fruits, also known as Frozen Fruit Frenzy is a puzzle game developed by Karl Hofer (blueskied.com).
Players control a bouncing ball to avoid monsters and skulls, blow up obstacles, and smash the eponymous frozen fruits to unlock more levels.

name: Monster Prom 4: Monster Con
description: Can you find love at the nerdiest convention ever? "Monster Con" goes back to the multiplayer dating sim formula: go through absurd and funny situations as you find love among six sexy monsters! Who will you romance? The mimic who cosplays? The idol clown? Or the eldritch cutie? (There's also Liam)

name: Acorn-A-Thon
description: ACORN-A-THON: Join Jark in the Ultimate Nutty Adventure! Save the Forest, Save the Future!

name: Super Mario 64 DOS Port
description: An unofficial port of Super Mario 64 for DOS.

name: Super Mario 64 Port: PSP Port of PC
description: A fork of Super Mario 64 Port with support for the PSP and the Dreamcast.

name: Super Mario 64 Port
description: An unofficial port of Super Mario 64 for the Wii U, fork of Super Mario 64 Port.

name: Leprechaun Twins
description: A pair of cute Leprechaun Twins had their pot of gold taken by a Griffin!

name: Yoiyami Biscuit
description: Sin descripción

name: (A)woken
description:
Alpha prototype of a mecha first person shooter made in godot.
It features hand drawn anime style character sprites, an endless arcade mode and a single player story mode.

name: Arcane TD
description: A maze building fantasy tower defense game.

name: Un-Matching Game
description: I'll show you four words. Find the one that doesn't match.

name: Vnm
description: Sin descripción

name: Miss Mantis
description: It is a female-perspective romance visual novel, in which you will play a marriage fraudster who is trapped between three different men, and it's up to you to decide whether you want to put your interests first or fall in love.

name: Sniper Elite 5: P.1938 Suppressed Pistol
description:
Equipped with the P.1938 Suppressed Pistol, you’ll gain the advantage of being able to quickly eliminate your enemies one-by-one with barely a sound to alert the rest of the squadron.

Originally an Axis Special Forces experimental prototype, in the hands of elite sniper Karl Fairburne, this weapon has just become even more deadly.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Up Close and Personal Weapon & Skin Pack
description:
Prepare for close confrontation with a new character look and bolstered artillery of heavy fire weapons.

Equip the Win & Co 1885, a heavy-hitting rifle that despite its restricted rate of fire, houses an enormous .50 calibre 50-110 round, capable of eliminating any enemy in its path with a single shot.

Complimenting the Win & Co 1885 is the ERMA.36, a submachine gun that features an integral suppressor and high muzzle velocity, making for a heavy but powerful stealth SMG.

Available in both Karl and Monika variants, the Tank Top Character Skin features brown leather accents and a rough and ready combat look for traversing the battlefield.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Airborne Elite Weapon & Skin Pack
description: It’s Rebellion's 30th birthday and to celebrate we are giving you the Airborne Elite Pack for free. It gives you access to the stunning Lee No.4 rifle, an iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin for Karl and a Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod pistol.

name: Love Kira
description: Love Kira is an upcoming visual novel inspired by the independent VTuber group Kira Kara, filled with drama, romance, and lots of comedy with the talented "Kiras" from the esteemed Kara Talent Academy.

name: Shattered Fate
description:
Embark on a journey of discovery through a medieval world that was shattered by a mystical event in this Souls Like game!

In the world of Albion, you will control Leif, a young man trying to find his destiny, casted on a decrypt and corrupted world, he will have to battle against evil forces, discover his fate and try to heal the world from Chaos.

name: Engines of Fury
description:
A thrilling top-down extraction shooter with ARPG elements.
Humanity is forced to live underground due to a meteor impact that released a mutagenic virus, turning the flora and fauna of earth into horrifying monsters. Can you survive this post-apocalyptic PvPvE shooter?
Gather your friends and find out.

name: Jenny Lusby: Intergalactic Adventures
description:
Jenny Pitstop Lusby is an ordinary girl with a passion for spaceships until she discovers that her grandfather is a living legend of intergalactic racing. Now, under the shadow of his extraordinary legacy, Jenny is thrown into a saga full of speed and challenges, fighting to prove herself worthy of her title. As she prepares for the big race that could define her destiny, she must overcome Merak, her grandfather's cunning rival, whose mechanical traps, armies of robots, and mind-blowing super spaceships threaten to end her journey prematurely.
Navigate through otherworldly landscapes and explore exotic planets in the peculiar galaxy of Pitstop. Defeat Merak's arsenal in each endless procedural match, develop your skills, upgrade your ship, and become an unbeatable competitor in this engaging racing and shooting game. You won't want to miss out on this intergalactic showdown!

name: Boomies
description:
Boomies is a 2D Roleplay/Simulation mobile game designed for kids based on characters from the Brazilian animated series WeeBoom.

Players can interact with the game's scenery and sound effects, befriend characters, and customize their Boomie using various unlockable options.

name: Pokemon Auto Chess
description: Pokémon Auto Chess is an auto battler fan game based on Pokémon Mystery Dungeon world!

name: Pigebomb
description: Imagine a world similar to ours, where various animals are the dominant beings. It is in this place that we follow the story of Peck, the top operative of P.O.W.E.R., a worldwide agency that is fighting the nefarious plans of P.E.S.T. This independent terrorist group plans to bring chaos to society. The two groups are vying to take over a superweapon, the eggbomb. Peck's mission is to prevent the PEST agents from obtaining this new weapon, in a story full of references to classic spy films.

name: UniqKiller
description: An upcoming multiplayer top-down shooter for mobile devices and PC.

name: To Kill a God
description: An immersive action roguelite experience with a groundbreaking skill system that allows you to craft your own skill tree. unlock the true potential of your character, delivering an ever-evolving experience.

name: LAIzy Picture Phone
description: LAIzy Picture Phone is an online multiplayer party game that combines the concept of a 'telephone game' with AI-generated drawings. Players write a prompt for an AI to generate an image, and the next player receives it and has to guess the phrase that created this image, which prompts generate another image, and so on.

name: Mooh
description: An adventure in space through a cow that was abducted and is trying to return home. Explore the planets, solve puzzles, save the mimosas and collect parts to improve the ship that will take Mooh back home.

name: Endless Chase: Fate of Bolek
description: Endless Chase: Fate of Bolek is a real-time RPG with time travel elements seamlessly integrated into both gameplay and narrative. It features five distinct core loops that alternate, set across three Sci-fi Punk worlds. These core loops, combined with non-linear gameplay and MetroidVania elements, provide players with a sense of freedom, choice, and empowerment, ultimately enhancing replayability.

name: The Standard Model
description: The Standard Model is a narrative walking simulator/slice-of-life game set in different worlds throughout the multiverse. The player takes on the role of an undergraduate student that gets to explore and experience 5 different worlds on a quantum adventure.

name: Kain Cobra: Autogun Blaster
description: Kain Cobra: Autogun Blaster is a 2D rogue-lite fast-paced shooter that blends kawaii charm with neon fury where our lazy anti-hero fights a mysterious intergalactic alien invasion to save Planet Blue!

name: Tales of Monsterland DX
description:
A village besieged by monsters, a mysterious tower and a broken rope bridge. Save the village by uncovering the origin of these creatures.

Run, jump and battle your way through a strange land, gaining powerful abilities to help you in your quest.

It’s non-stop action all the way to the end, and then maybe you can find your way home.

name: Procelio
description: Procelio is a multiplayer voxel-based vehicle builder and shooter. Create your chassis and combine movement parts, guns, and other functional utilities to create a remote-controlled war machine, then duke it out with others in the war tearing its way across the Martian frontier.

name: My Brick Breaker
description: Mobile brick breaker arcade game. No ads. One-time in-app purchase.

name: Cryptica
description: Cryptica is a narrative-based psychological horror game where the apocalypse is just the beginning. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas while the world ends.

name: Helbreath
description: Sin descripción

name: Babylon X
description:
Alternative history of the Ancient World: Mesopotamia, 6000 BC. A technological revolution against the backdrop of an impending apocalypse.

Energy, gravity, and its connections with ancient magic were discovered, leading to technological advancements in Babylon and Egypt. At that point, the struggle for resources had begun.

A former prophet who is now a runaway slave and avenger joins forces with a young moon cult priestess to prevent the imminent construction of the Tower of Babel. Betrayed by all, he starts a new life and finds love in a world that is about to end.

name: Ragtag Heroes
description: Ragtag Heroes is a co-op rogue-lite deckbuilder for up to 3 players! Players craft their own deck, defeat powerful foes in strategic combat, collect rare cards and relics and save the realm together!

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Sengoku Gunyuuden
description: Sin descripción

name: Attack on Mutation Station
description: A genre-hopping mystery about neon spaceships, alien plants, digital demigods, and the nature of reality.

name: Flap Happy
description: Flap your wings off in the world's first 8 Bit Avian Roguelike Platformer! It’s you versus gravity, sharks, and more as you flap to dodge hazards, collect fruit, and land on platforms. Each stage has its own hazards, and the procedural randomization means you’ll always be flapping it in somewhere new!

name: Minty Monkey
description: Minty and her friends embarked on an adventure to defeat the terrible King Krumpa and recover the fragments of the mystical jewel.

name: Relic Abyss
description: Choose a class out of 20 adventurers and unearth powerful relics. Min-max your character's stats, upgrade your talents, and smith the most powerful weapons in this action survival roguelite RPG!

name: Macis
description: Macis is a platform game focused on exploration. In this game, you control a young Chia in a search for her parents, who mysteriously disappeared when she was a child. Your main suspect? The one responsible for security in the city where she lives. Finding her parents seems like an impossible challenge, but alongside her team of bounty hunters, she is confident that she can finally find out what happened.

name: Break a Leg
description: Break a Leg is a series done over YouTube shorts where the top comment got the next addition to the game. Break a Leg is a game where your primary goal is to break your leg. Once you do, you did it. You won. Therefore, there's no more reason to keep playing this game.

name: Castle Come
description: Castle Come is a walking fortress roguelike. Scout a strange land full of bandits in search of new parts, defeat enemy castles and scavenge the wreckage, recruit crew to man your growing arsenal of weapons and build your way from an agile fortling into a deadly, hulking, monster machine.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: Cancelled port of Wolfenstein 3D for the Sega Genesis.

name: Raider's Saga
description:
Raiders Saga is the ultimate gaming experience of 2024, where chaos and beauty collide in a Cybernetic Anime Themed Viking Saga.
Engage in Seasonal Matchmaking to delve into the realms of PvP, PvE, and Raider Racing! Battle it out in PvP Arena Deathmatches and intense PvP Capture the Flag modes, showcasing your skills like never before.

Feel the itch for speed?
Join our Matchmaking Racing Odin’s Cup to satisfy your racing desires!

But wait, there's more!
Embark on epic adventures with friends through our PvE Matchmaking, conquering Dungeons and Raids as you strive to become the next(esports) legend.

Join Raiders Saga today and immerse yourself in a world where legends are born and epic tales unfold!

name: Garuya and the Kaleidoscope of Syzygy
description:
"During the night, monster ruins are rising from the skies, ancient prophecies speak of a new syzygy."

An epic platform RPG where you play as a wizard named Garuya who wants to investigate the strange return of ruins from a distant past that are appearing throughout the land of Foltabur.

name: Beach Bums
description: Beach Bums is a cheeky 2D hidden object memory game in which the player must reunite beachgoers with their swimsuits after a tidal wave washes them away.

name: DeathRoll
description: DeathRoll is a horror strategy game inspired by games such as Buckshot Roulette, Inscryption, and Balatro. Play as a damned soul that must save itself from the grips of the monsters in the underworld.

name: CorActio
description: CorActio is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements set in an alternate, polluted version of our world. Developed by the indie studio Delusional Ram, this game immerses players in a mission to cleanse the environment from the relentless industrial pollution.

name: Cursor & Meow
description: In Cursor & Meow, many cats crave your attention, but not all of them will be easy to catch. To find some of them, you'll need to use a lot of concentration, dexterity, and logic! The game features numerous puzzles, challenges, and mini-games that will make your search entertaining and varied.

name: A Mask's Tale
description: A Mask’s Tale is an investigation and suspense game that takes place in an alternative version of the city of São Paulo. In this dystopian reality, people are forced to wear masks, hiding their faces and identities.

name: Kitty Rhythm TD
description:
Welcome to the fair!
Help the cats to cheer up with music so the ball will be a success!
In this game, the song’s beat dictates when every move will happen.

name: RoboGal: Gaga Delta Lady
description: Rei-Bo was living peacefully on the island of Plutobell, until a giant spaceship crashed into the place! This is a fun and humorous saga to solve this incident full of obstacles and traps! Choose the levels in the order you want, defeat the ship's members and get their weapons in RoboGal!

name: Popgoes Arcade: Fighting Chance
description: "Fighting Chance" is an upcoming FREE major update for POPGOES Arcade on Steam. My final attempt at perfecting the original vision for the game, giving those who enjoyed the game a reason to play it again, and those who didn't enjoy it a reason to give it another try.

name: Pikes.io
description:
Ride your horse and get your spear ready. It's time to join a jousting tournament! Challenge other brave knights in this classic and win the ladies' favors.
Join thousands of players in Pikes.io! Collect rainbow dots while trying to defeat your enemies. Control a knight with a pike or a spear and attack your enemies -- you can defeat them with a single blow, so move as fast as possible! The more dots you collect, the faster you become, and the bigger your pike... Can you take over this arena?

name: Dark and Darker Mobile
description: Dark and Darker Mobile is a Fantasy Extraction RPG. Players will embark on a daring journey in this PvPvE experience where they will vanquish cunning adventurers and monsters while exploring dungeons consumed by an encroaching darkness. As players delve deeper, treasures hidden within the shadows will promise unparalleled wealth and power, waiting for the bravest souls to claim their riches.

name: Spear of Destiny Super CD Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Case of the Mysterious Maulings
description: The good news: you've been invited to a classy dinner party in a stately gothic manor! The bad news: you're a hideous, bloodthirsty monster and you keep viciously murdering people. Avoid suspicion by pretending to search for the killer while framing the other party guests. It's kind of a "Clue" meets "Monkey Island" meets "Doom" meets a dating simulator kind of thing.

name: Battle Talent: Multiplayer Update
description: Sin descripción

name: Drums Rock: Campaign+
description: Sin descripción

name: Blocksworld
description: Sin descripción

name: Holotanks
description: Sin descripción

name: What the Bat?: Batty Goes to Battywood
description: Sin descripción

name: Disembodied
description: Sin descripción

name: Pencil!
description: Sin descripción

name: Laser Dance
description:
From the creator of Cubism comes LASER DANCE, a mixed reality game that turns your living room into a laser obstacle course straight from a spy film!

Players move between two buttons on opposite ends of their living room, traversing a sequence of laser patterns which adapt to the room’s size and layout. Different laser patterns will have them move in different ways, as they dance, dodge, and crawl their way to the finish line.

Easy to learn but hard to master - Laser Dance’s deceptively simple gameplay makes for a perfect party game to get both newcomers and seasoned VR players moving in mixed reality!

name: Sigils of Nightfall
description: Sigils of Nightfall is a roguelike deckbuilder that combines dungeon crawling with elements of the award-winning RPG, Mörk Borg. Embark on a dark journey, improve your character, and survive at all costs — or be consumed by the horrors lurking in the darkness.

name: Alkahest
description: Alkahest is an Action-Adventure RPG set in a murky medieval world. Where satisfying melee combat with highly interactive environments takes center stage. Explore realistic locations, learn alchemy and make a name for your family.

name: Reproach
description: Reproach is a narrative beat 'em up with time-travel and gay cowboys. Help 50’s detective Stout and his new friends, the hard-core band Potus Flotus, to close time rifts across space-time and save his detective partners scattered across time.

name: Rootin' Tootin'
description: A 2v2 cowboy platformer game where players aim to win by collecting coins and items and shooting opponents.

name: Die Feen
description:
This appears to be an island or a peninsula.
This is because the Nider and Loub tribes do not have the ability to draw maps, the Erlmutel tribe does not have the personality to travel far to draw maps, and the Ferns are not even interested in topography, so there is only one person who knows it well. There was no one there either.

name: Cattle Country
description: Howdy partner! Welcome to Cattle Country, the only Cozy Cowboy Adventure Life Sim. Become a determined pioneer traveling west to start a new life. Make a home in the mountains, take on bandits, discover dastardly plots, build a farm, develop your town, and make friends with fellow residents.

name: Gods vs Horrors
description: Recruit gods from different mythologies, buff and upgrade them, arrange them in perfect formation, and create thousands of synergetic builds! Gods vs Horrors is a roguelike card autobattler in which you coordinate gods to defend the Earth against cosmic horrors.

name: Is it Wrong to Want to be Locked up, Toyed with and Tortured by a Hot Guy?
description:
Mamiya Hibiki is a regular guy with not so regular interests. He’s a huge fan of the decade-old drama series Possessive Boyfriends, and his favourite character by far is Kirisaki Shin: a deranged yandere who expresses his love with continuous threats of entrapment, torture, and murder.

Hibiki might enjoy fictional characters threatening to kill him, but he’s far less receptive about real men teasing him about these desires.

That’s what Hibiki thinks, at least – until he runs into his silver-tongued tormentor yet again, and things start to get serious…

name: Catalina's Horror Adventure
description: Catalina's Horror Adventure it's a game of terror, shooting, adventure and humor. Our mother shows us a treasured place from her childhood, an abandoned arcade. After trying to turn on the light, our protagonist appears in a totally unknown place; "The World".

name: Nar Station
description: Strange Games Studios, the team behind Honor and Duty: D-Day is currently working on D-Day Enhanced. But that hasn’t stopped the developer from working on a new project. Called Nar Station, this seemingly sci-fi horror-esque game is coming to PSVR 2.

name: IL-2: Korea
description: Sin descripción

name: Mace the Adventure
description: You take on the role of our heroine, who decides to visit the local arcade center, owned by the eccentric Minos. Unknown to her, this is the start of a strange journey...

name: F.R.A.G.G.
description: Step into the future of gaming with F.R.A.G.G, the ultimate arena combat experience powered by Unreal Engine 5. Prepare yourself for next-generation graphics, intense multiplayer and singleplayer gameplay, and a universe brimming with excitement and competition.

name: Auti-Sim
description: This game was developed during Hacking Health Vancouver 2013 hackathon. The player navigates through a playground as an autistic child with auditory hypersensitivity. Proximity to loud children causes sensory overload for the player, impacting cognitive functions. This impact is represented as visual noise and blur, as well as audio distortion. Participants described the experience as visceral, insightful and compelling.

name: Beatblock
description: Spin to win, and move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat.

name: Hello Yogurt
description:
A scientist, after the death of a loved one, strives to create the perfect lactobacillus in order to prolong life, and with that you play as the surviving lactobacillus who's trying his best to survive the hazards of the human body by jumping over obstacles, enemies, spikes and bottomless pits!

With the coins you get in your runs, you can upgrade or even evolve your lactobacillus to survive longer and you can get bonus prizes by using pills in capsules!

name: Kromaia: Annvrsary X
description: Experience the explosive VR remaster of Kromaia, celebrating its tenth anniversary! Immerse yourself in frantic old-school action, high-octane blasting, and a 360˚ environment. Unleash your firepower anywhere and everywhere in this groundbreaking VR adventure!

name: A.N.N.
description:
A.N.N. is a challenging, adrenaline-fueled boss rush that features:

Intelligent Enemies: The bosses in A.N.N. are powered by a cutting-edge machine learning algorithm. Each enemy you face has been trained over millions of iterations using reinforcement learning, making them intelligent and ruthless adversaries against even the most skilled players.

Fast-paced Combat: A.N.N. emphasizes aggressive, engaging combat. Fluid controls and snappy movements make every split-second decision determine if you emerge victorious or face defeat. No time wasted on levels or boring minions... get straight to the action with the most vicious bosses you've ever fought.

Player Progression: Defeat bosses, steal their strengths, and become more powerful. Just when you think the game can't get any harder, step into the next boss fight and push your limits.

name: Artificial Heart
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokemon Shiny Gold Sigma
description: Sin descripción

name: Wonder Wander
description: Become a Trekker and chill out while exploring the world in Wonder Wander, a relaxed and easy-going idle adventure game! Take a break from your busy life, discover hidden wonders and meet other friendly Trekkers, and explore at your own pace without breaking a sweat!

name: Nightshift Galaxy
description: Play as a freelance mecha-pilot in a satirical anime-scifi setting. Arcade-style combat with transforming-robots, spider-tanks, and high-speed fighter-jets.

name: Zombie Survival
description: This is the first game where the theme is literally zombie survival. No Humans Allowed, except as the main course. An apocalyptic city building survival game where you grow the zombie horde and take over the world.

name: Mars Mayhem: Shooter Simulator Warfare
description: Sin descripción

name: 11 Years
description: 11 Years is a 3D marine survival game where you play as a Clownfish trying to survive from the direct and indirect human influences on the coral reef ecosystem. The player will experience phenomena such as ocean acidification, coral bleaching, ghost nets, and dead zones to see how each harmfully affects both the reef and its inhabitants. Through our educational narrative and various collectibles, we aim to educate players about the dire situation in our marine ecosystems. 11 Years intends to both contribute to the climate change dialogue as well as convey the experiences wildlife animals have to endure because of human impact.

name: High Sidin'
description: High Sidin' is a 1v1 drifting co-op game where players rack up points "swinging" their cars in an arena called the ring while onlookers get hyphy.

name: Small Talk
description: Sin descripción

name: Kiwi Khaos
description:
Short little MSX game made by me and Lihpten. Made entirely over the 2ish weeks of the 1st Retro Platform Jam, with our progress streamed every few days on my Twitch channel for long, messy hours. This was our first time messing with MPAGD and it certainly shows. We had a lot of fun and would love to make more, especially whenever an MSX2 engine rolls around.

This release is stripped back compared to some earlier builds as it's more optimized for playability and less glitches, though it certainly has its fair share still. In the future we'll most likely be adding music (which was planned but scrapped at the last second due to scheduling conflicts), fixing many bugs, adding a Screen 2 intro screen, re-implementing a double jump (which was swapped to a high jump last second due to glitches), finishing the ZX spectrum port, and prettying up the graphics/animation.

name: Starborn Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Troll Face Quest: Game of Trolls
description: Troll Face Quest - a popular series of adventure quests distinguishing feature of which is a huge amount of humor, a hilarious cast of characters and dozens of funny situations. Troll Face Quest: Game of Trolls - a new part of the franchise, this time the developers have borrowed a number of popular themes from movies, comics and fairy tales, thus building a logical story of passing which you have to go through about a dozen different worlds. The developers kept the General atmosphere, graphics and characters.

name: Let's Learn Japanese! Complete Collection
description: A bundle of every game of the Let's Learn Japanese! series.

name: Idle Knight RPG
description:
Idle Knight RPG is offering great experience for RPG lovers.
You will enjoy many type of good looking items , dungeons, global boss, pets , potions , skins and competitive leaderboard.
It is designed to be f2p , less ads and quite battery friendly.
You can simply put your phone aside and enjoy auto farming while you are having your daily life.

name: Kiwi: Airborne
description: Kiwi: Airborne, is a 2D side-scroller, made with Godot, in which you help a Kiwi fulfill its dream of flight; made for the 2020 Open Jam in a weekend, inspired by the short film Kiwi!

name: Kiwi
description: Play as a Kiwi bird surfing down an ancient and holy Kiwi tree (the homeland of the Kiwi birds) to escape and gain your freedom. Little do you know, it is a magical and endless tree, and your quest for freedom is but a simple dream. Of course, your endless surfing is not fruitless, for once you tire and trip from a knot of the tree bark, you split in half, becoming a delicious kiwi for the hoomans to enjoy.

name: Reminisce
description:
Remembrance. Requiem. Rebirth. Repeat.
A (mostly) linear 500-word collection of microstories created for the 2024 Neo-Twiny Jam.

name: TC!Underfell
description: Welcome to Underfell, an alternate universe of Undertale where the various monsters in the underground are vicious, where the law Kill or be Killed was firmly established. Never has the monster race been so divided before, gangs, mobs, a once united kingdom has now fallen and erupted into pure chaos. Can you survive the horrors of the underground?

name: Onsen Nozokimi Daisakusen
description: Onsen Nozokimi Daisakusen is a flash game in the Persona series available on the official Atlus website made to promote the release of Persona 4.

name: Pokémon Eclesia
description: Pokémon Ecclesia is a Pokémon fangame created by pingupollas. This game combines humorous elements with a serious main plot and innovative mechanics. It is heavily influenced by OT, as well as the games Fear and Hunger and Bloodborne.

name: Marvel's Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur: Moon Girl Moxie!
description: Team up with Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur to catch some baddies!

name: Ultimate Indie Racing
description: An Arcade Racer with 40 Indiegame Characters to play and Race Tracks inspired by Indiegame Worlds. Explore the ULTIMATE Indie Experience!

name: Bread Fish Clicker
description: A simple and fun game where players click on a fish and a piece of bread to increase their respective counters.

name: Ms. Pac-Man: Maze Madness 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Poultry Princess
description:
What a day for Princess Guinevere! Knight Arthur arrives tomorrow for their wedding, but she was cursed during the night and she woke up as a cute little chicken!

Will Guinevere manage to find the culprit and restore herself to her human form...or will she fall in love with one of Poultry Princess' 3 love interests on her way?!

name: Set Yourself on Fire
description: A linear visual novel. ------ A quiet town awaits death. Stagnation is the default state of being. Two aimless young women fall in love.

name: Contra Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Athena Cykes: Ace Attorney - Locks on the Heart
description:
LotH takes place in 2029, after the events of Spirit of Justice.

Athena Cykes takes on a case where a double murder has been committed at VideoVention, an online video convention, and one of her close friends is suspected of being the culprit. Shortly after taking her friend's defense, Athena gets wind of a case involving an evasive serial killer named the Executioner, who has been at large for a very long time and seems to be uncatchable.

name: Viva Veloce
description: Viva Veloce is a retro top-down street racing game with everything modernized. Race! Earn money! And be the king of the streets of Rome with your tuned, 4 wheeled, monster.

name: Hooked!
description:
An 18+ Visual Novel set in the early 2000s, about three girls trying to make their way into the adult entertainment industry! They meet you, a clueless fisherman, who has no idea about his potential.

Get to know the girls closely, and make fun naughty videos with them! It's a comedic, lighthearted and goofy story filled with lewd stuff!

name: Demons
description: Demons is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. An evil cult tries to unleash an ancient demon and all that stands between them and the apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

name: Inspector Schmidt: The Ebbing
description: It's the year 1870. You have to solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen: question the villagers, detect clues, combine them to new information and decipher the mysterious signals that arrive at the station of the first transatlantic telegraph cable in a little village on the North Sea coast.

name: Scorchie Adventures
description: A platformer game in which you play as Scorchie, a friendly and hyperactive will-o'-wisp who's able to pass through a variety of obstacles using their dash ability and fire properties.

name: Nyan Nyan Parasol
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallendom
description: Fallendom is a doujin action RPG developed and published by Platine Dispositif in 2013

name: Crista Caelestis
description: A 4-player fighting game based on Raknarok Online.

name: Sentimental Gensoukyou
description: A mysterious letter comes to Rinnosuke and written on it is, "You're boring!". Filled with anger, he travels around Gensokyo visiting all the girls in order to find the sender. Sentimental Gensoukyou is short adventure visual novel developed by Seventh Heaven Maxion using Live Maker engine. The game features 12 different scenes which can be choosen freely by player to determine route and storylines.

name: PhoboPhobia
description:
Enter the depths of your mind in a 2D Roguelike - Dungeon Crawler game that will challenge your skills.

Immerse yourself in a labyrinthine neural world, where you will face the worst phobias.

Collect resources, items and meet people who will help you on your path to improvement as you unravel the mysteries of your psyche.

name: Space Harrier
description: A port of Space Harrier for the Sharp MZ-700, released via a magazine in Japan.

name: Cowboy Carl
description: Fast paced gun slinging action like it's 1885 in 1979! Shoot All those pesky bandits before they rob the Bank using your scope! Now for your Atari 2600 featuring Color graphics and top of line SFX!

name: Heartbreaker: The Visual Novel
description: A retro-styled psychological-thriller visual novel with dark yuri themes, about an Osakan college student who stalks her love interest and bumps off any rivals who get in the way.

name: Gaggl
description: Gaggl is playable television. Twitch streamers watch and react to TV and movies from a DMCA-safe library that is perfect for live watch parties. Viewers play-along with Gaggl in chat, creating a live and interactive community experience.

name: Ravage
description: Ravage immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Survive by battling hunger, thirst, and enemies. Build and fortify bases, raid for resources, engage in intense PvP, and join clans. Experience immersive realism. Are you ready to face the challenge?

name: Village Slut Transformation
description: The terrifying story of Lily - an innocent girl who gets corrupted into a village slut.

name: Bound By Broadcast
description: A cartoon inspired puzzle platformer that takes you on a journey through giant stacks of old TVs. Navigate six unique cartoon episodes, solve puzzles, save the creatures and shut down the Broadcast that is twisting your fellow island dwellers.

name: Punch A Plant!
description: Smash into Punch a Plant!—a thrilling VR action game where you protect your spaceship's generators from mutated plant enemies. Use powerful fist gauntlets to punch, smash, and survive. Play solo or with friends in an endless survival mode. Get ready for intense, immersive combat and nonstop action!

name: Paplion
description: Fight along with your Papling through the worlds inside a mysterious book called Paplion! Explore unique biomas, befriend new Papling and make them stronger through evolution to defeat your enemies in this classic style monster-catcher RPG and 2D platforming adventure.

name: Taika
description: Taika is a cozy VR puzzle game set in a wizard's home, where you mix ingredients by following recipes to be found by you to get magical abilities. The environment contains several puzzles that you can solve with those newly acquired magical powers.

name: Backrooms
description: Explore an abandoned liminal space. Uncover dark secrets through eerie exploration and environmental storytelling. Evade unpredictable supernatural entities and face psychological horror. Will you reveal the truth or become another lost soul?

name: Shoni Island
description: Stylized strategy/survival god game couched in a world inhabited by living beings trying to survive and be happy. Build, farm, educate, socialise and worship the gods as you solve the island's mysteries in a bid to leave the island once and for all!

name: Twilight Canyon
description: A free perspective survival pigeon game! Select up to 7 soul stones with different mechanisms to assist in battles, and use skills to cast 5 magic arrays with different functions! And these attacks will also contain elements. You will combine these to form a diverse genre.

name: Toxic Therapy
description: Toxic Therapy is a VR game that's stocked with breakable items, fun discoveries, and an arsenal of tools.

name: Forsaken Shadows
description: This is a chilling horror escape game that thrusts players into a world of darkness and dread. With shifting environments, secrets hidden within the shadowy depths. Beware of deceptive illusions and hidden traps as you struggle to survive and escape the clutches of the unknown.

name: Bandit Trap
description: Defend your home against a bandit invasion using inventive boobytraps as a Trapper, or join a team of three Bandits and try to get away with the loot! Introducing BANDIT TRAP—a fresh 3vs1, chaotically fun, physics-driven online multiplayer game for the whole family.

name: Invaders
description: Crack space ships, Improve your machine, and Get New Lead Pilots to the Resistence, through fantasy "Worlds", and some also known to us across the Solar System. In a 2,5D "Fixed Shooter" based on the old style of the iconic Space Invaders. .. from a time where much less, seemed much more.

name: Luminous Threads: A Visual Novel
description: Luminous Threads: a cyberpunk visual novel with captivating graphics and music. You are Juno, a teenage girl getting evidence to clear her brother's name. Choose who helps you solve the mystery. With multiple endings, your actions in flashbacks may even change whodunit, with what and where!

name: Canyons
description: Canyons is a third-person extraction shooter set in a procedurally generated post-apocalyptic world. Fight for your existence in 4 player co-op or solo, control massive Crawlers, build a settlement for survivors, and conquer this savage world!

name: The League of the Hustlers
description: Join the league of hustlers, a secret organization of revolutionaries, cheating card players, swordsmen and detectives. A game that mixes classic adventure games with card tricks, duels and investigation in a plot to uncover the truth.

name: Roshpit Champions 2
description: Roshpit Champions 2 is a distinctive Online Action RPG. Players explore hand-crafted maps filled with omnifarious monsters, powerful bosses, and legendary equipment. Design a personalized combat style and carve out your own unique builds - in hopes of overcoming the will of an Ancient God.

name: Bluma
description: Join Bluma in this puzzle-platforming adventure where you make the platforms. It’s up to Bluma and her magical tail to unite the realms by solving physics-based puzzles and farming vegetables.

name: Zombots: Invasion
description: Zombots is a fast-paced, wave-based survival FPS where players will have to utilize unique weapons, powerful upgrades, and exciting abilities to fend off hordes of invading robot zombies!

name: Loop: Beginning of Never Ending Journey
description: A Boy With Amnesia Embarks On A Journey In Search Of Answers. It's a 2.5D game set in a surreal world, where you embarks on a mysterious journey filled with unexpected plot twists, thrilling action and challenging puzzles. Loop is an adventure that will keep you guessing until the very end.

name: Star Patrol Nova
description: Star Patrol Nova is a sci-fi narrative driven deckbuilder inspired by science fiction anime of the late 70's and early 80's. Take control of a team of four Star Rangers as they defend the Free Star Systems from a deadly new enemy.

name: The Stellar Station Engineer
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy, station building game where you need to manage resources and protect the station and human inside from the danger of space, and your own action.

name: My Femboy Roommate
description: In this choice-based visual novel, you move into a new house with a new roommate who you come to find is a.. Femboy!? Now that you are living under the same roof, build your relationship with him to achieve different endings and branching paths, with unique scenes and outcomes.

name: Tiny Tanks
description: "Tiny Tanks" delivers thrilling turn-based battles where strategy reigns supreme. Choose from a variety of unique weapons, and engage in dynamic battles across destructible environments. With both story and survival modes, it's time to conquer the battlefield and become the ultimate tank commander!

name: The Perfect Bowl
description: Uncover the stories of your customers with a nice warm bowl of personalized Ramen in this cozy interactive fiction. Travel around Xibalba, a harsh and frigid planet, to meet new people, catch up with old friends, and guide them along their lives depending on the ingredients you choose to add.

name: Unyha
description: Unyha is the first-ever autochronicle online RPG, where your adventures, victories, and defeats become real stories that influence the game for all, and forever. History content is generated by Unyha's unique Autochronicle AI, making it truly aware of players' activity—and naturally responds to it.

name: Legend of Merchant 2
description: Collect simulation management game with no bankruptcy or death. Resources can be obtained through farmland, cooking, or wild collection, and can be directly sold to shops or used to complete residents' commissions to earn money.

name: Deity's Domain
description: Deity's Domain will be a god-like city builder strongly inspired by Black & White series, set in ancient Rome, in which you will have to compete with other deities to reach Olympus, during this journey you will be accompanied by your Creature, create your path and become what you want to be.

name: Skelet_666
description: Kitschy vintage GZDoom powered FPS: First Person Slasher. ~Awaken! Slay SKELET_666! Head to Old Arath! Take the Forgotten Sword to the kingdom Old!

name: Splinterra
description: Explore flying islands. Capture creatures. Use powerful spells. In this VR rpg.

name: Gunswitch
description: GUNSWITCH is a top-down arena shooter: Mow through hordes of demonic aliens. Upgrade your weapons to fire thousands of bullets within seconds. Escape space prison with your robot squad. Switch your loadout on the spot to adapt and become a killing machine.

name: Fly Hard
description: FLY LOW. FLY FAST. FLY HARD.Jump in the hot seat and get ready for an action-packed roguelike fighter jet thrill ride. Unlock weapons and upgrades to push your aircraft to the limit as you fight through an endless onslaught of enemy aircraft.

name: Zenith Heroes
description: Rise to the challenge in Zenith Heroes, the ultimate Battle Royale experience! Dynamic environments, diverse heroes, intense firefights—prove your skills solo or team up to dominate. Constant updates keep the adrenaline pumping. Are you ready for the zenith of gaming?

name: Takeout
description: Takeout is a Fast-Food themed Mascot Horror Game, where you wake up in a freezer, with a rough idea where you are, but you most definitely don't want to stay, nor are you alone.

name: Ultimate Action Hero
description: Shoot, punch, kick and blow things up! You can be all the iconic badass movie characters and replay your favourite action scenes. And all of that with great synthwave music by NIGHTRUN87.

name: Rushuzen
description: Rushuzen is a turn-based roguelike focusing on gear and character power.

name: Unholy Legacy
description: Something evil has awoken, something ancient. An unholy force lurks in the shadows and the darkness of night. As fate would have it, you must now face this evil. To survive, you must fight, solve puzzles, and unravel the mystery of this ancient and unholy legacy.

name: Rogue's Realm: The Old God
description: Merged "Rogue-like" and "Auto chess" genres, crafting unique gameplay. Combine abilities from four classes, enjoy dynamics and adrenaline, customize characters. Get ready for surprise-filled battles!

name: The Bucketlist Tourist
description: The Bucketlist Tourist is a physics-based multiplayer party game where players complete tasks and capture them photographically. In the battle for the best snapshot, they share only a single camera.

name: Solstice
description: Help Poppy as she journeys through unknown lands in search for her lost sister. Unknown secrets lie ahead, as not everything is originally as it seems... Solstice is is an emotional yet action-packed journey of self-discovery, forgiveness and acceptance.

name: Shredded Faith
description: Enter Shredded Faith, a world of ancient mysteries and modern challenges. Master combat, survival, and arcane arts while exploring towns, wilderness, and dungeons. Craft gear and shape your destiny alone or with a guild. Every choice counts in this dynamic realm of adventure.

name: Dreams of Sand
description: Solve block-based puzzles, manipulate time, wander through Reverie's dreams in the sand - relive and choose how they recount their life's memories just so.

name: Echoes of You
description: Sacrifice parts of your own body and mind to gain powers. Survive the abyss, uncover the many ancient secrets it keeps, and find what your soul truly desires.

name: Demon Still Alive
description: Demon still alive is a metroidvania with brutal action – platformer using skilled combat set in the nightmare world of Demons. Explore, upgrade your abilities , unleashed the power of fire and ice and executes the enemies that stands between you and your destiny.

name: Devil's Deal
description: This game throws you into the shoes of a character struggling to survive in a corrupt ghetto overrun by gangs, mafia bosses, and crooked politicians. This is no ordinary RPG; Devil's Deal is designed for players who dare to delve into the heart of darkness and pay the price of their choices.

name: Battle Grid Arena
description: Ready for a stress-free strategy game with a twist? Battle Grid Arena lets you transform heroes into beasts, gather ressources, build a base, and recruit monsters mid-battle. Engage in tactical combat and humorous romantic adventures. It's strategy gaming with a smile!

name: Truck Manager
description: Create and manage your own truck company. Create routes and transport cargo all over the world while you expand your fleet of trucks and logistics centers. Truck Manager is among the most realistic of the simulator genre - so prove yourself and beat your friends and other real life managers.

name: The Shadowed Rune
description: 'The Shadowed Rune' is a challenging roguelike game that you can play solo or in two-player co-op. Combine the power of runes to discover new spells and ascend the tower to break the curse.

name: Rise of Tochos
description: Take action in this immersive 3D experience where you can build your own village, command your troops into battle, and plunder resources from enemies.

name: To Hell and Back
description: Traverse the landscapes of Heaven and Hell in search of your loved one's lost soul and rescue them from Purgatory.

name: Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator
description: "Ukrainian Fight Drone Simulator" is an ultra-realistic combat simulator for future military personnel and FPV enthusiasts. Improve your piloting skills, learn mission planning strategies, and feel the adrenaline of modern combat!

name: Bugtopia
description: In Bugtopia, you can purchase and raise insects to create your own eco-box. Sell them for profit or keep them in the eco-box for continuous idle income. Buy more diverse eco-boxes, decorate them, and enjoy a wonderful summer with the insects!

name: Spinning Battles
description: A top-themed auto chess game, select parts to strengthen your top and battle against heroes from all over the world!

name: Medo do Escuro
description: In Medo do Escuro (Fear of the Dark), you follow Bianca, a 6-year-old girl who needs to explore a haunted house on a journey to rescue her stuffed bunny named Apep.

name: Contained
description: Contained is a monster pet simulator in a sci-fi base. Take care of your monster and use its powers to keep the base running. As it grows, you can discover new skills, moods, resources, and rooms. But beware, this monster can be wild!

name: Duskmire
description: A thrilling 2D action rogue-lite platformer filled with countless spells and magical combinations. Craft your strategy by mixing powerful spells. Each playthrough offers a unique and challenging experience.

name: Ataegina Act I
description: In a world filled with magic and riddled with war, you find yourself playing an important role. A life of spellcraft, politics and intrigue awaits you. Will you use your powers to unify the land and its people? Or shall you use them for your own personal gain and amusement, no matter the cost?

name: Iron Door
description: As a physiatric patient, you find yourself trapped within the labyrinth of your mind. To escape, you must delve into the depths of madness, confronting the shadows that haunt you.

name: From The Ground
description: FROM THE GROUND is a third-person PvP shooter. Play as juicy characters and face off yourself on the battlefield in a wacky universe.

name: Climate Survivors
description: The climate crisis is hitting humanity with increasing force - but you're hitting back. Dodge, fight, and level up in arenas around the world. Customize your champion and utilize the full arsenal humanity has at its disposal to show an endless swam of natural hazards who's boss.

name: Distraught
description: Find your way through an abandoned village in DISTRAUGHT. A first person Atmospheric thriller with unique pixelized graphics. You find yourself on a highway looking for a way to fix your car. When you come across a nearby gas station, it seems to be abandoned. Or is it?

name: Chicken with Robot Legs
description: Chicken with Robot legs is a Runner-Vania game where you explore a map and find secrets while constantly moving, your only objective is find a way home. Find upgrades that let you explore further and further while unravel the secrets of this unknown place.

name: Ties: Soul Link
description: TIES is an Emotional and Brutal 2D Metroidvania, combining Action RPG elements with Adventure Platformer.An exciting story of resilience and overcoming fears. Explore incredible cities in a world in decline, set in the year 2097, full of secrets and with brutal and bloody gameplay.

name: Feline Survivor
description: Feline Survivor is a rogue-lite game that combines classic Monopoly and Backgammon.You'll travels different planets, defeat countless monsters, and build the perfect map loop and weapon combos in this game of luck and tactics, until you finally find the secret treasure guarded by the monsters.

name: Rogueween
description: Rogueween is a roguelike, bullet hell, top-down arena shooter game where candies grant shooting abilities, treats provide power-ups, tricks offer extra challenges, and you battle waves of Halloween-themed enemies in this action-packed adventure!

name: Rotosaurus Adventure
description: Rotosaurus Adventure is a puzzle game with a twist. Rotate the world to traverse obstacles and find a way into the goal. Manage boxes, avoid spikes, and use other tools in creative ways to overcome mind-twisting challenges!

name: The Way You Died
description: How did this person die?! Use your deduction skills to find out! In this first-person view detective game, you will role-play as a medical examiner through several real-life, weird cases. Inspect the crime scene to gather clues, collect intelligence, examine the corpse and perform an autopsy.

name: Fucksweeper
description: The absolute most brutal possible version of the classic game Minesweeper, sponsored by FUCKBETS.PIZZA.

name: Unlighted
description: You will play as a test subject that works for a company called Umbral Alchemy, dedicated to the research of stones with mysterious properties never seen before by humans. Thanks to you they hope to discover the origin of these strange materials, but it won't be an easy path.

name: Teenage Wasteland
description: Teenage Wasteland is a hugely detailed, open world RPG set in the early 2000's! With over a hundred perks, dozens of cliques to help/harass, and hundreds of choices, you can be the teen YOU want to be...

name: Lovely Traps Dungeon
description: Your quest : Guide a golem through mad dungeons filled with platforms, traps and puzzles. Recover lost madn-- knowledge at all cost (golems are just moulded clay after all)

name: Bloody Roses
description: Unravel the sinister secrets of St. Ludmilla's Academy. Navigate eerie hallways, solve chilling puzzles, and escape the nightmare that lurks within. Can you survive the terror?

name: Gaia VN Collection
description: Dive into a world of intrigue with our captivating visual novels: Wonderful Summer, Winter Heart, and Yandere Story. Engage in heartfelt conversations, uncover secrets, and experience unique stories. Discover where their tales will take you.

name: Police Car Parking 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Jim Brimstone: Devil Advocate
description: Jim Brimstone: Devil Advocate is a short visual novel where you play as the world's worst lawyer. Lie, deny, and manipulate your client's way to freedom!

name: Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Bobble
description: A cancelled BBC Micro port of the hit arcade game Bubble Bobble that was supposed to come out in 1989.

name: Those Days
description: Those Days is a casual gay adult visual novel about a guy who decides to spend a few days in his family's farmhouse. There he meets Cott, Salmi, and later on, a few other characters that will make his vacation a bit more interesting.

name: Conflict FPS
description: A strategic team-based first-person shooter. Battle it out in this fast-paced multiplayer shooter. Several game modes to choose from and a range of different maps.

name: Purple: Director's Cut
description:
It’s 1996.

You play as Randall Purpura, a 23 year old man who has just been released from a lengthy hospital visit for mysterious reasons. He lives in a small studio apartment in LA California.

He meets Mya, his new neighbor who wants to become quick friends with him.

He also meets Tate, the handsome man down the hall. He never seems to be home when you want him to be.

Explore the city, solve puzzles and try to unlock the mysteries of Randall’s past.

name: Tupi: The Legend of Arariboia
description: Tupi: The Legend of Arariboia is a turn-based roguelite role-playing game based on the story of the Indigenous hero Araribóia and the set of myths that make up South American native mythology as a whole.

name: Lethal Weapon
description: Cancelled version of Lethal Weapon for the Sega Master System. Only the music for it has been found.

name: Project Astrid
description: Shroud announces Project Astrid: The new Open-World Survival Shooter game he’s been working on alongside Sacriel and Splash Damage to bring forth a new era of gaming. Splash Damage has over 20 years’ experience working on some of the biggest IPs in the world; Halo, Gears of War, Doom & more. Combined with my expertise in the FPS Industry - I believe we will create something truly special.

name: Helbreath Argentina
description:
Helbreath is a dark medieval MMORPG featuring intense PvP, strategic alliances, and a trade-centric economy. Choose between two warring factions and immerse yourself in epic battles and quests in a vast fantasy world.

Helbreath es un MMORPG medieval oscuro que presenta un intenso PvP, alianzas estratégicas y una economía centrada en el comercio. Elige entre dos facciones en guerra y sumérgete en batallas y misiones épicas en un vasto mundo de fantasía.

name: Nova the Squirrel 2
description: Nova the Squirrel 2 is in development for the SNES. It is planned to have a stronger storyline focusing on Nova as well as a unique mouse named Maffi.

name: Gunman Clive
description: A port of the Game Boy edition of Gunman Clive with some altered colors. It is only one stage long, like the Game Boy version.

name: Fairy Fixer
description:
NSFW parody of Winx Club, you control an unknown male spellcaster as you meet the cast of Winx Club, partake in events leading up to the first half of the first season and romance every female in the cast.
You can have erotic interactions with most of the cast of Winx Club aside from the protagonist Bloom and as most of these games work, the event will end with a minigame based on different erotic scenarios with the cast. You have dating sim interactions where you can choose between different dialogue choices and, like most dating sims, the routes for certain characters will end in an event, the aforementioned erotic scenes.
There are also time based combat mechanics.

name: Keeping SNES Alive
description: A homebrew for the SNES.

name: Project Werewolf
description: Enter a world full of mystical dangers in the merciless northern Sweden. Uncover the dark secrets of the werewolves as you fight for survival in a relentless open world. Will you solve the puzzle of the beasts and conquer them?

name: Super Party Games Online
description: Do you love minigames? Looking to play online with friends with no limits? Meet Super Party Games Online, and find a varied choice of minigames for a fun-filled online party gaming experience with your friends. With the ability to play with up to 3 friends to bring your social gatherings to life!

name: Casual Trucking
description: Drive your truck and deliver the cargo, buy properties and accumulate wealth

name: Finch & Archie
description: An episodic co-op murder mystery in which you play as one half of a crime-fighting duo: Jack Finch the detective or Archie the police dog! Use your skills to find evidence, interrogate suspects, and catch the culprit in a gritty 1930s setting.

name: Survive Ten Days
description: "Survive Ten Days" is an open-world survival game in a post-apocalyptic setting, where players will face threats such as resource scarcity, zombies, and other survivors.

name: The Cursed Land
description: Embark on a mystical MMORPG adventure with "The Cursed Land"—a world of ancient myths, diverse classes, and strategic combat where every choice forges your destiny.

name: Ragdoll Tumble
description: I love ragdolls and I love physics, so I thought I would mush the two together with a level editor and make a cool sandbox game for people to play around in. Currently, there is a very basic JSON-based level editor and 20 pre-built levels.

name: Uphill
description: A precision platformer that allows you to alter the environment.

name: One of Them
description: One of Them is a Social Deduction sci-fi horror game. Up to 12 players are playing either as a Human Astronaut trying to escape, or as a disguised Alien Beast out to kill everyone.

name: The Dragonspire
description: It is a dark modern world with a massive surprise to Fantasy, including Scandals, Corruption, Death, Tough Choices, and entire Character Progression while the shape of the world around you changes. The romance you will experience along the way will be rewarding and have an in-depth storyline.

name: _Turing
description: "_turing" is a new sci-fi adventure game that allows the player to chat with the heroine during the story and teach her feelings to the AI heroine, thereby changing her personality and the outcome of the story. What will happen to you and Iris after you learn about her feelings?

name: Free Stars: Children of Infinity
description: Experience a stellar space adventure and the sequel to The Ur-Quan Masters. Travel through hyperspace, engage in fast-paced combat, discover weird worlds, and meet a unique cast of truly alien aliens as you uncover a mystery that threatens the galaxy.

name: Saikin MMO
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Saikin by Shiryu Studios. Explore fantastical worlds, battle fierce enemies, and uncover secrets that will change your journey. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, Saikin will keep you on the edge of your seat. Play now and experience the magic!

name: Duck Creator 2
description: Duck Creator 2, Create your own Duck but better version!

name: Vrsus Dead
description: So many zombies and so few bullets!

name: Under The Concrete Wave
description: Under The Concrete Wave is a 3rd-person cooperative platformer where you alone or with friends take control of robots who have decided to leave the pit of monstrous brutalism. Jump, fall, throw objects, throw friends, solve puzzles (or not) on your way up.

name: Skylark 64
description: A 64-bit 3D Collect-a-thon Platformer where you play as A flying squirrel who can glide, run, jump and roll in open non-linear levels collecting Acorns, Soul Leaves and 7 pieces of armor with unique power-ups! You can even play with a friend in Split-Screen Co-op!

name: Cyberpunk Inquisitor
description: The world's first rogue-lite point-and-click adventure! As an Inquisitor in a dystopian cyberpunk world, enter a Megabuilding and solve the immersive, procedurally-generated murders within. Talk to witnesses, collect evidence, identify the culprit and unmask the truth!

name: Re:Connect
description: "Re:Connect" is a one-stroke Sokoban programming puzzle game that reconnects the rules. Become an AI that fixes system glitches in the world of the Internet and reconnect the "bugs" in the world!

name: Redemption
description: A first-person action horror game set in a military research facility infested with dangerous creatures, navigate your escape while battling to stay alive in this enigmatic location.

name: Keepers 1477
description: The classic beat em up game is now here with the medieval Ottoman theme, with 3d environment and unique features offered by the unreal engine and its physics engine, magnificent illustrative drawings! Dash towards the zombies, fight with your own combinations and save the capital from zombies!

name: Queen of The Hill
description: You are a Queen Ant who has taken her colony's survival into her own hands. Fight off hoards of enemies while also being a good mother Hatch swarms of (questionably intelligent) children to gather food for the nest Aid your swarm as it grows up big and strong

name: Sakura Priestess and Shikigami Mountain
description: Sin descripción

name: Rise & Fall: Online Digital Edition
description: Risse & Fall is a game involving strategic units positioning, territory control and opportunity seizing designed by Christophe Boelinger (Dungeon Twister, Earth Reborn, Archipelago, Living Planet...). Each player leads a nation trying to expand and progress in a fantasy world.

name: Football Clubs
description: Welcome to FIFpro's officially authorized operating card football game. A console game experience using 3D original engine and next-generation modeling. Collect the world's top star lineup and instantly compete with your friends in a global game.

name: Department of Collections
description: A tasked based procedural online co-op sci-fi horror game that can be played both casually or more hardcore

name: SeekIt: Max Dublin's Treasure
description:
Max Dublin's Treasure is a trivia learning game for the Apple II.

Max Dublin has hidden his treasure of silver, gold, and jewels throughout the land, and has unfortunately torn the treasure map into pieces. With the aid of Mr. Light, the player must retrieve the map pieces to Max Dublin's three treasures. The player must travel with Max Dublin to a number of exotic locales, and using the New Book of Knowledge Encyclopedia Volume A published by Grolier, must answer questions about these locations. Correctly answered questions help the player locate map pieces. As the player travels, they must spend money to refuel their plane, and they risk running out of fuel money before collecting all map pieces if they do not answer enough questions correctly. After collecting all pieces for the silver map, the player progresses to the more challenging gold and jewel maps. As the player searches for treasure, a mystery man wearing a bandanna attempts to sabotage the player's effort by stealing money or fuel if questions are answered incorrectly.

name: 100 Aztec Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the Azcte-themed with Cats in Ancient World! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Ancient themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: Simple Tennis
description: A Pong clone for Vircon32.

name: BlueTooth BiPlanes
description: Sin descripción

name: Moeyo Butaman!?
description: A canceled platformer from EIM.

name: Psiplex
description: An anime-styled social sci-fi SRPG game. As an inspector, navigate through the Megapolis where material production has reached its zenith, and confront the unending conflict between psychics and ordinary citizens. Only by shattering all the rules of this beautiful new world can you achieve rebirth.

name: Creepy Tales
description: Creepy Tales is a cooperative horror and survival game for 1 to 4 players. The players are orphans in an orphanage run by a priest possessed by an evil entity. Defeat him, survive, and save your friends!

name: Alien Strike: Blasting the Intruders
description: The earth has been invaded by aliens, and even though they are still in training, a group of soldiers are trying to save their city while trying to understand why it happened so quickly.

name: Crimson Capes
description: Crimson Capes is a soulslike Action-RPG taking place in a Sword & Sorcery setting. Engage in fluid 2D pixel art swordplay, hunt witches, track monsters and experience the age of high adventure.

name: Widen
description: It should only be a short trip through the woods... He seems to lose himself and mix up reality with his own mind. Experience Widen as a new definition of psychological horror

name: Ragnarok Age of Heroes
description: Ragnarok has struck, the gods have fallen, and Yggdrasil has collapsed. As one of the surviving humans in the last refuge, you face harsh environments and threats from other races. Bereft of technology and divine protection, humans must rely on their own strength to rise in this new era of heroes.

name: Little Herbal Baker
description: Little Herbal Baker is a cozy and laid-back game where you play as Lilia, a novice baker who has freshly arrived in a town called ‘MILKYWOOD’ in the fantastical world. Taking over a bakery formerly managed by a master baker, you are now embarking on your journey to become a master baker.

name: Mechieval
description: The twilight of the plague-ravaged Middle Ages. Pilot a five-story-high mech, unleashing torrents of ammunition, dancing with magic, and hunting the demons spreading pestilence in this frenzied top-down shooter.

name: Picterra
description: Explore a colourful world full of interesting flora and fauna to document with your camera and notebook

name: SteamStar
description: Sin descripción

name: Codename: God
description: Randall is your typical nerdy kid living a normal, unexciting life in the 80s. Secretly in love with the most popular girl in school and bullied by the soccer team gang, one day he meets you, a divine entity who can change everything!

name: NanoDeath
description: "NanoDeath" - A 2D roguelike-y game where you are a nano-based pathogen sent to destroy a human's body with intense combat and tactical decisions.

name: The InBetween
description: The InBetween is a 2D, action-packed yet emotional Undertale-Metroidvania in which your fate, as well as the fate of an infected world, lies in your skills and choices.

name: Rogue Defense
description: The first of its kind, a Tower Defense Roguelike. Unlock, build, upgrade, expand, and defend with a continuously expanding path from multiple directions which you can influence.

name: Z-Factor
description: Story-driven RPG with survival elements. Open seamless world, first person view. Adventures on an island where intelligent life has been destroyed by a zombie virus.

name: Crank It Up!
description: Sin descripción

name: Tarzan VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Funny World Quiz
description: Funny world quiz is a challenging trivia game with fun facts questions about what each country is famous for. Most topics are about culture, natural wonders, world records, strangle laws, curious things in politics and history. It is NOT like the simple geography questions in many other apps.

name: Buster Baxter: Lung Defender
description: Sin descripción

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 12
description: Sin descripción

name: Minotaur
description: Minotaur was a 2012 horror game by Puppet Combo (formerly Pig Farmer Productions). The game never exited the Alpha development stage but was remade into Power Drill Massacre, in 2015.

name: Undercity
description: Try yourself as the subway train driver. You should transport a lot of people according to a schedule. Your reward depends on this. The money can be used to improve the train or to transfer to another major city where you can already drive a new and powerful train. Enter the subway car quickly, do not drive past the stations and arrive right according to the schedule, when the timer is at 0. Not before and not later. Also watch out for vandals and terrorists!

name: Project D
description: Sin descripción

name: Good Luck Citizen
description: In the heart of a post-apocalyptic world, where civilization has crumbled and the dead roam the earth, lies the setting of our epic zombie game. This isn't just any ordinary survival horror experience; it's an immersive, adrenaline-fueled adventure where every decision could mean life or death.

name: Create & Conquer
description: Create your own (mini)games and play them with friends online. Customize the map, weapons, NPCs, gamerules and more!

name: Cyberpunk Sister
description: A high speed Stylish Action Game about 2 girls in the future world，use your gun sword and fist to finish the enemy and save the world!

name: Lust for Lucre
description: Lust For Lucre is a fantasy-themed match-3 dating sim combining strip monster battles and dungeon exploration. Romance 14 unique damsels and explore perilous dungeons. Use your lust and lucre to upgrade stats and acquire powerful items in this adult adventure.

name: Unnamed Shovel Knight Sequel
description: Sin descripción

name: Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon - Paradox Pack DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Shovel Knight: Dig - Fate and Fortune
description: Sin descripción

name: Mina the Hollower GBC Demake
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Gameboy
description: A complete port of the original Five Nights at Freddy's game to the Game Boy system.

name: Super Mario War
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Orange
description: Sin descripción

name: Bottomless Block Barrage
description:
Bottomless Block Barrage (BBB) aims to be a Panel de Pon/Tetris Attack/Pokemon Puzzle League clone for the 3DS.

This game is a work in progress but it is currently playable.

name: Sheep It Up
description: A Game Boy port of Sheep It Up.

name: Wakey Wakey
description: A Puzzle Platformer about a sleepy guy...who just wants to get to Bed.

name: Tenalatro
description: The Strategy-Puzzle Roguelike. Tenalatro scratches your casual chill problem solving itch, every run has a random collection of game changing modifiers, hacks, and new shapes. Want to compete? Global Leaderboards, a head-to-head match with friends, and the Daily Challenge are for you!

name: Necromage
description: Be a necromancer who can learn to summon any creature from the world. Level up and equip your minions by crafting enchanted spells to use on them. All this takes place in an isometric action-RPG with intense combat and powerful bosses that will require your army of minions to defeat.

name: Slimecore
description: Slimecore combines arena combat, rogue-like power progression, and slick slime rail grinds into a high-octane team-based hero shooter. Creative builds, dynamic teamfights, endless ways to play – unleash your slime and see what you can do.

name: Tamer: King of Dinosaurs
description: A survival/action/dating sim with an interactive world based on the best selling harem novel series by Michael-Scott Earle. Fight, hunt, and tame dinosaurs, craft weapons and tools, build a fort to protect the alien women you love, and experience a romance story like no other.

name: Dog Walking Simulator
description: Dog Walking Simulator: Walk a menagerie of dogs and do your best to bring them happy, healthy, and satisfied. Take care of your own pets as well and even open your own dog-related business!

name: Freezer Frenzy
description: Freezer Frenzy is an action packed arcade drift-racing game set in a supermarket. Race to the exit as quickly as you can while completing challenges on the way!

name: 7th Floor
description: Find your missing daughter in the Hospital of Madness. Collect items, fight enemies, and do whatever it takes to reach her!

name: Path For The Seeker
description: Path For The Seeker is a detective adventure in which a young nun investigates the disappearance of a famous inventor in a city on the border of two worlds.

name: Panic In Store!
description: You play a supermarket employee who must (in each level and within a given time) put the right boxes in the right departments. But be careful! Customers will come after you to waste your time!

name: Office Odyssey
description: Office Odyssey is a laugh-out-loud adventure that pokes fun at the absurdity of corporate culture. With its casual roguelike mechanics, every run is unique, offering endless replayability and a constantly evolving office landscape.

name: Versus Purgatory
description: Versus Purgatory is a micro-roguelike shoot-em-up with mind-bending gameplay inwhich you delve into a dungeon, controlling two characters at the same time.
