name: Deadbeat Wizard
description: Follow Garth and Pigeon as they discover and solve occult mysteries in this action-rpg shooter.

name: Hetu
description: "Hetu" is an ink painting-style CCG themed around cultivation. In the game, players build decks based on the unique characteristics of heroes from three races: Humans, Monsters, and Gods, to compete in battles.

name: Framework: Found Footage
description: Through the lens of VHS camera, you are given the task of unraveling the twisted framework of seemingly never-ending liminal spaces, also known as the backrooms. Explore unique narrative driven themes of solitude, mystery, and horror.

name: SCP: Site Director
description: An SCP Facility Management game with strong visual stylings that allows you to run your own SCP Foundation Sites, capture anomalies, hire staff to contain and research them, and recontain them when they escape. Orchestrate multiple sites and guide your clandestine organization to success!

name: Yoba2D
description: A 2D shooter with unusual movement mechanics, because our character has a simple circle with a face. You have to explore complex abstract worlds and fight with other players and abstract personalities using quite familiar weapons.

name: Downware
description: You have a date with your girlfriend Lucy, but nothing will go as planned. The cyclops Mark-13 is enforcing martial law. Dive into the dark and immersive world of DownWare, a first-person cyberpunk horror game.

name: LavaLoop
description: LavaLoop is a music-driven shoot'em up, in a hand-drawn Steampunk universe. Face a mad queen and destroy the planet killing machine. Play as three musician fighters and jump from surprise to surprise in this unique fantasy universe.

name: Pneumatic Panic
description: Pneumatic Panic is a physics-based chaotic co-op road trip game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow companions must arrive at the campgrounds with your supplies, avoiding obstacles along the way.

name: Pager
description: 1-bit 3D Kafkaesque horror in a 90s office building. Obey the pager to survive your first day at work.

name: Trasmoz Legends
description: Introducing a brand new retro arcade game designed exclusively for modern computers and consoles, drawing inspiration from the classic Trasmoz Saga for ZX Spectrum and the Amstrad CPC.

name: Gravity Surge
description: A puzzle shooter with intuitive and physics-accurate gravity changing abilities. Use your ability to change gravity to solve puzzles, fly through levels and dodge enemy attacks, then target enemy weak-points with one of your guns to disable or destroy them.

name: Threshold Sector
description: You've been stranded by your company in a section of the facility known as "threshold sector". You'll have to find weapons, meds and equipment to survive and try to escape the complex. But be as careful as possible: everything down here wants you dead.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Legend of Shu Han
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Legend of Shu Han" is an RPG game with the theme of the history of the Three Kingdoms, in which players control Liu Beijun to crusade against the rebel thieves in the vast land of China.

name: Acts of Blood
description: Acts of Blood is a Beat ‘em up, Action, 3rd person game which focuses on fast-paced, brutal hand-to-hand combat. Set in dystopian city of Bandung, Indonesia.

name: Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune
description:
Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey filled with a brand new collection of adventures in Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable voyage into uncharted territories and discover the mysteries that await!

Explore new ages with the promise of swordfights, ship battles, pirates and maybe even treasure (?!) as you sail into uncharted waters and navigate the age of the buccaneers. What other exciting new eras may Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune unlock for eager time travelers?

name: Gyras: Rogue
description: A Spinning Top RPG with in-depth customization, exciting battles, and crazy platforming.

name: What is My Name
description: A strange, unfamiliar environment greets you: Towering walls, fathomless pits, ledges and ropes connecting rooms in the strangest of ways. There must be something around here to serve as a clue.

name: Fule
description: Embark on an Interstellar Odyssey! Captain your own starship amidst a network of bustling transit stations, ferrying passengers of diverse species. Upgrade your vessel, navigate volatile interspecies relations, and avert cosmic chaos in this thrilling sci-fi saga!

name: Be Honest
description: Be Honest is a completely normal personality quiz.

name: Flee or Be: Chapter One - Lurking Alone
description: Start a long journey where every choice shapes your fate. This is a world of suspense and survival, where decisions are your lifeline. And discover the unexpected power of independence.

name: Exit16: Byilhan Hotel
description:
"Exit16: Byilhan Hotel" is a "walking simulator" & "Spot the Difference" game. The game challenges players to unravel hidden anomalies strewn across the enigmatic corridor of the Byilhan Hotel.

Each floor of the hotel presents a unique canvas, with some adorned by the peculiarities of anomalies while others maintain an eerie semblance of normalcy. Your task is to discern the subtle nuances that distinguish the ordinary from the extraordinary, as every object, every angle, and every shadow holds a potential clue.
Traverse the hallways with caution, for not all anomalies reveal themselves readily.

If you suspect there is an anomaly, turn back. If you believe everything is normal, that there are no anomalies, do not turn back and continue down the corridor. If you make a mistake, you will know by looking at the level number. If the number has increased, you have made the correct choice. If you return to level 1, you have made a mistake and will need to start over (the anomalies will be different). The goal is to reach the final level.

Navigate the twists and turns of the Byilhan Hotel, unraveling its mysteries one anomaly at a time.

name: Penguin Take-Off!!
description: A penguin races through the ice for its family. Sometimes sliding, sometimes flying, it overcomes numerous challenges. "Penguin Take-Off!!" is a side-scrolling sliding action game. Despite its catchy graphics, players will experience a tension where not a single mistake is permitted.

name: Miro and the Flower of Youth
description:
Miro is a single-player, 2.5D action RPG where you embark on a heartwarming journey of exploration, platforming, and rebuilding. Take control of Miro, a mutant with a big heart, and set out to restore your hometown and surrounding areas after a nuclear fallout caused by his creator, Vitto.

Explore vibrant yet desolate environments teeming with secrets and hidden areas waiting to be discovered. The game rewards curiosity and exploration, offering extra challenge and replayability for those who seek it.

Dive into turn-based combat that allows you to strategize your moves and abilities. Action commands during battles add an interactive element, increasing engagement and rewarding skillful timing. Unique partners with diverse abilities join you on your journey, offering strategic options in both combat and exploration.

A richly crafted narrative unfolds as you explore the world, uncovering its mysteries and meeting unforgettable characters. The game’s lighthearted atmosphere and humorous tone create a fun and memorable experience.

Intuitive controls and easy-to-understand mechanics make the game welcoming to players of all skill levels. Playful and whimsical art style with a focus on creating a cheerful and inviting atmosphere.

name: Paper Pal
description: Embark on an adorable adventure as a paper doll that came to life in a kindergarten! Fueled by a fear of being discarded, you set out to find a way to slip into your creator's backpack resting atop a towering shelf. Explore a whimsical world with a vibrant cast of sentient toys, each with their own quirks and stories to unfold!

name: Kokoa
description:
"Use magical costumes to save the world from a magical magician with malicious intent!"

Kokoa is a family-friendly turn based RPG coming soon to Itch and Steam!

name: Wishmaker
description: Wishmaker is an RPG inspired by Deltarune and Paper Mario's combat. Full of cute animal people and pretty pixel art.

name: Taro the Sneaky Ninja
description: Sneaky Ninja is the stealth game Nintendo would make, a 2D stealth platformer mix of Mario and Mark of the Ninja! Classic platforming meets tactical stealth action with a wide range of difficulty modes for a game both casual and hardcore can enjoy!

name: Unheil
description:
Unheil invites you to a thrilling adventure filled with suspense, where you attempt to unravel the mysteries while trying to find the murderer of a crime committed in a cursed mansion in "Unheilsdorf," a town in Northern Germany in 1930. The story begins when the case is assigned to Alexia after a traveling journalist is found dead in the mansion he was investigating.

You'll witness unprecedentedly chilling events as you try to uncover the dark secrets lurking within a cursed mansion alongside Alexia. This village has never returned any of its visitors. Will you be able to escape the clutches of this cursed village?

name: Kaorin Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: The Grass of Genesis
description: This third-person action-adventure seems to be akin to the beloved Tomb Raider series and the adrenaline-packed John Wick film franchise. The gameplay video showcases a prototype that introduces various gameplay elements and engaging animated cinematic sequences.

name: Unbirth
description: Unbirth is the first 3D game from Frictional Games.

name: Rider's Spirits
description: Sin descripción

name: Hastafa Invaders
description: Hastafa Invaders combines intense arcade shooter action with a rich storyline and dynamic characters. Players are immersed in the conflict between the Azure Dominion and the Crimson Legion, experiencing the thrill of aerial combat while unraveling the fate of the enigmatic planet Hastafa.

name: Air Garden
description: A tiny cozy idle incremental game where you grow plants and pop bubbles to clean the air.

name: Bumpy Jumpy
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last of Us: Between The Years
description: The Last of Us: Between The Years takes place in the 20 years following Sarah's death and before the main events of the first game. It delves into Joel's character during this period and his grieving process. Explore the relationships Joel forms during this time and uncover some unexpected secrets hidden within the universe of The Last of Us. This game does not contain any spoilers for the main storyline of Part 1 or Part 2.

name: Pizza Delivery: A Short Thriller
description: A horror/thriller about what may happen when delivering a pizza late at night.

name: Love Eternal
description: Wander a castle built of bitter memories in LOVE ETERNAL, a psychological horror platformer with devious trials and an unsettling, experimental narrative. Find a way out - or live in Shelter forever more.

name: Break an Egg
description: A homebrew game for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive in which the player controls a chicken who has to prevent falling eggs to fall on the ground, aiming to get them into a basket.

name: LJ65
description: A homebrew puzzle game for the NES.

name: Raining City: Millions Recollections
description: One night, Luxuan woke up soaked in blood, a mysterious black hole in the palm of her hand – and millions pouring out of that hole, like an unstoppable fountain of wealth. Still in shock, Luxuan has to evade the monsters that rushed to her and her new riches. A strange story begins in a gloomy city…

name: Experiment 427
description:
Experiment 427 is a free modification for The Stanley Parable. During development, the modification got abandoned and never got finished. There is a beta version, however.
The mod begins when a player activates the Confusion Ending and clicks on the Confusion Schedule. The player is then teleported out of the map on the opposite side of the Confusion Schedule and begins a new adventure. The mod was also going to customize the game's textures, add new objects, change the main plot, and add new rooms.

name: Abaddon
description: Abaddon is a first-person psychological horror game steeped in Lovecraftian elements. Descend into a haunting story as you take on the role of Jimmy, searching for his missing brother Georgie while confronting his past in a nightmarish world.

name: Menhera Ota-hime Circle: Needy Princess Nerd Club
description: The story follows a student named Sugihara Natsuki, who joins an otaku club and meets the only female member, Mizushiro Kaoruko, who is a typical otaku girl that wears lolita clothes and doesn't use makeup. Natsuki and Kaoruko become close and eventually start a romantic relationship, but Kaoruko's status as a "taken" girl leads her to become arrogant and cause conflicts with other girls in their school. In order to feel valued again, Kaoruko decides to become the "princess" of the otaku club, which causes Natsuki to feel excluded and unsure of their relationship.

name: Arena of Dreams
description:
Arena of Dreams is a free multiplayer party royale packed with various mini-games.

Survive and Thrive: Be the last one standing! Survive, advance and win medals if you reach the podium at the end of the rounds! Ensure your survival by teaming up in Co-op mode to tackle challenges that can only be found in your wildest dreams. Dive into a surreal and thrilling universe full of fun, action-packed adventure challenges!

name: Once Upon a Galaxy
description:
Once Upon a Galaxy is a mobile based card battler brought to you by Million Dreams.

Recruit a rag-tag squad of fairy book characters, heroes from legend, scheming villains and treasure hoarding dragons as they do battle across the galaxy where last one standing wins.

name: Dungeon of Fercho'po
description: Jam Theme: Solitude - You are a lone treasure hunter exploring a once abandoned dungeon. You will face the perils that lurk inside without any party members or renewable supplies. Try your best to get the loot and then make it back out alive!

name: The Book of Buja
description: Explore the vast, open world of Darrow. Solve puzzles and collect the six Stalm Pirate remains. With the help of the Zapra Viti Hourglass and your ability to peer into a corpse's demise, uncover the mystery behind the Queen's untimely death.

name: Skull and Bones: Season 3 - Into the Dragon’s Wake
description: Sin descripción

name: Backpack Survivors
description:
A crossover between bullet heaven and inventory management. In Backpack Survivors the player fills his backpack with weapons and items which are then used during the bullet heaven portion of the game. During this, the player will kill hordes of enemies and keep upgrading their backpack to grow stronger and even defeat bosses.

Backpack Survivors has roguelite elements with unlockables and a large talent tree, allowing the player even more customizability over the game.

Backpack Survivors is currently in Alpha and is slated for a release into Early Access in late 2024.

name: Mahjong on the Beach
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure 3
description: A software port and expanded fork of the original Adventure by Dave Platt written in PL-6 for Xerox Scientific computers running the CP-V operating system.

name: Athena Cykes: Ace Attorney - Trials of time.
description: Two years after what happened in Khura'in, Athena Cykes - an attorney, encounters a bunch of strange cases, with her ex co-worker: Apollo, being in Khura'in, and her boss - Phoenix Wright's sudden dissapearance, she has to solve the cases on her own, discover all the mysteries, and find out how they are all connected. And also find her boss. Will she do it? I don't know, that's for you to find out.

name: Gunboat God
description: Become the all-powerful Gunboat God in this fluid shoot 'em up. Carve the waves as you stylishly fight hordes of monsters in hundreds of quick-fire missions. Transform your Gunboat and upgrade your weapons, skills and abilities to take on giant, challenging, multi-stage bosses!

name: Streets of Fortuna
description: Use your wits to survive the generated chaos that is living in the Streets of Fortuna. A free-roaming sandbox game about growing from street rat to a tradesman, a priest, a smuggler, an alchemist, a spy, or perhaps someday a leader to rival the Overlord.

name: Hotel Galactic
description: Hotel Galactic is a cozy management game inspired by Studio Ghibli's classic pictures. Build the tourist destination of your dreams, oversee and unite your staff to forge a quirky family, and make new friends as you explore this wholesomely nostalgic world.

name: Crescent County
description: Crash headfirst into this witch-tech open world, drifting and driving on the back of your new motorbroom. Make deliveries, trick out your broom, and race your new friends (and crushes) as the sun sets. Decorate your flat, sort your life out, and discover what it means to find home.

name: Little Critters 2
description: Embark on an epic journey in "Little Critters 2," where survival and adventure intertwine in a captivating world filled with vibrant landscapes and unpredictable challenges. As the latest installment in the beloved Little Critters series, this game takes you on a thrilling adventure like never before.

name: Among the Wild
description: Among The Wild is a first-person farming game where you wrangle fantastical creatures, build and manage your own idyllic farm, and set out to explore uncharted corners of a strange universe.

name: Parity Shot Integral
description: Sin descripción

name: Gears of War: E-Day
description:
Experience the brutal horror of Emergence Day through the eyes of Marcus Fenix in the origin story of one of gaming's most acclaimed sagas.​
Fourteen years before Gears of War, war heroes Marcus Fenix and Dom Santiago return home to face a new nightmare: the Locust Horde. These subterranean monsters, grotesque and relentless, erupt from below, laying siege on humanity itself. ​
Built from the ground up with Unreal Engine 5, Gears of War: E-Day delivers unprecedented graphical fidelity.

name: Flick Kick Football Legends
description:
Kick it old school with the latest game in the Flick Kick series — tackle, pass, shoot, and more!

Flick Kick Football Legends brings Flick Kick to all new heights with more diverse on-field gameplay, team building and management, and a multi-level league structure.

Packaged in a vibrant, comic-inspired style filled with lively characters, quirky scenarios, and rich animation, you will guide your team towards a highly sought after championship win to achieve legendary status.

name: Rainbow Fish Goes to College
description: The Player plays the titular character: Rainbow Fish! Yes, from the children's book. Except he's all grown up and is ready to take on his first day of school. Help him survive while also peering into the life of a fish who wants to be more than the book he's known for

name: A Growing Adventure
description: Explore and grow a world in which a fantasy RPG adventure awaits.

name: Stuck At Lv. 1
description: Stuck At Lv. 1 is a roguelike action RPG in which the player plays as a protagonist who is cursed and is unable to "level up" his vampiric abilities, and must work around this restriction. Explore the Vespera Realm, steal enemy attacks and find out the truth about your curse!

name: Neon Rain
description: Neon Rain is a hybrid between a Metroidvania and a Boomershooter.

name: Dishop
description:
In the year 2063, human civilization teeters on the brink of collapse as the world descends into a devastating chaos, wrought by resource scarcity, relentless warfare, and rampant pollution. However, tragedy reaches new dimensions when an unexpected event ravages the Earth.

An outlaw, sentenced to the death penalty for a series of heinous acts, emerges as his dark past intertwines with the struggle for the survival of all humanity. At the heart of the chaos, the fate of the human race is at stake in a colossal confrontation, where the indomitable will of an anti-hero challenges the relentless force of an unparalleled event.

name: Sonic PC Port Remake
description: The Sonic PC Port Remake is a Sonic creepypasta game created by JohnKun and JoeDoughBoi.

name: Solomonic
description: I've made a game where you can split a baby in two. I didn't want to publish it because I feel bad about it, but people seem to like it?

name: Mr. Flip
description: Sin descripción

name: Ivor
description: A blood-pumping throwback FPS set in a Norse-inspired world. The undead have risen and Ivor, the Drengr, has awakened. Take up your axes, load your shotgun, and get to killing.

name: The Name is Dio
description:
The Name is Dio is a game in which you must survive for the most time you can!

Loot the foes!
Survive longer!
Get higher points!

name: Memory Clash
description: Memory Clash is an engaging multiplayer memory game set in a fantastical world filled with magic and mythical creatures. Players immerse themselves in an enchanting realm where they compete to uncover and match pairs of magical cards. Each turn reveals a new challenge, testing the players' memory and strategy skills as they aim to outwit their opponents. With vibrant fantasy-themed artwork and dynamic gameplay modes, Memory Clash offers an exciting and challenging experience for players of all ages. The game supports both cooperative and competitive play, allowing friends and family to enjoy the adventure together or against each other in epic memory battles.

name: Netflix Stories: Perfect Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Reflection by Delphinium Interactive
description:
Reflection is an 02A2 Visual Novel Game Jam Submission!

This game was made in five days by a small team.

name: Hollow Flowers
description: Sin descripción

name: The Path into the Abyss
description: "The Path into the Abyss" is a hardcore first-person open-world survival shooter set in Buenos Aires with a backdrop of cosmic horror, combat mechanics, dynamic AI, and looting.

name: Naughty Geese
description: Naughty Geese is a 2D pixel art platformer. You control a biker goose who tries to keep his offspring safe from predators. As they like to escape and enjoy the scenery, Dad needs to go after his "Naughty Geese" every time. Enjoy unique gameplay that pays homage to classics of the genre.

name: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth!
description: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth is an interactive experience, following a pair of astronauts trying to find a way to help a planet in peril; Through hope and wit solutions can be found despite coming across unexpected challenges.

name: Heaven Crawler
description: Heaven Crawler is an atmospheric isometric roguelite hack-n-slash dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Traverse through an ever-changing babelian structure filled with robots. Collect Helmets, Armors, Mechanical Arms and strengthen your character to ascend to Heaven and save your mother's soul!

name: Ila: A Frosty Glide
description:
Set foot on a magical island and immerse yourself in a whimsical small open world as ILA, a spirited young witch-in-training with her trusty skatebroom. Explore, find secret places, collectables, and improve your magic and flying abilities as you make your way to the summit.

Explore a whimsical small open world as ILA, a spirited young witch-in-training. Start your journey fueled by determination and your trusty skatebroom. Find secret places, collect valuable items, and improve your magical flying abilities.

Who needs a broom when you have a skatebroom? Soar through snowy mountains and enchanted forests, feel the wind as you cross stunning landscapes. Master and upgrade the magic of your to soar higher and farther.

Explore ILA’s small open world at your own pace and relax. Find hidden nooks, uncover treasures, and unlock secrets flying on your skatebroom. Each discovery rewards you with valuable items and deeper lore, enriching your magical journey.

Collect special items and coins to personalize ILA’s outfit with stylish hats, capes, and skatebrooms to reflect your unique style. As you progress, access new skatebroom upgrades to improve ILA’s flying powers.

Feel the magic and enjoy the captivating original soundtrack composed by Joaquim Scandurra (Sku), which builds up and grows with you as you approach the summit.

name: Mythmatch
description: A Greek mythology community sim about bringing people together by putting things together.

name: Sandara: City of a Thousand Eclipses
description: Use your cards to roleplay in a harsh world where your home is slowly sinking into the sands. Enter the city of Sandara and build your deck, make allies, enhance your abilities, and manage your resources before the eclipse ends your life.

name: Croakwood
description: Croakwood is a creative, relaxed town building simulation game about frogs and nature! Design and create structures, plan and decorate towns, and explore an ancient forest to guide the growth of a charming community of tiny amphibians as they settle into their new life in the lush and wild woods.

name: All Systems Dance
description: Automation is not the answer; DANCE is the key to disruption! Help liberate citizens of a consumption-obsessed, corporate dystopia in All Systems Dance: an expressive dance battle adventure. Connect moves, express yourself, feel the music. Join The Movement. The revolution will not be choreographed.

name: Zodiac XX Leo
description: Zodiac XX: Leo is an explosive underwater arcade piloting sci-fi and political drama reimagined from our 2020 Humble Trove release “Zodiac XX”. Suit up and take command of the elite ZODIAC squadron and dive deep in high-speed ultra-manueverable “sinker” submarines, engaging in thrilling piloting action unlike anything seen in the 6DOF genre.

name: Possessor(s)
description:
Possessor(s) is a fast-paced action side scroller with combat inspired by platform fighters, a story told through dangerous characters, set in a deep interconnected world ready for exploration.

Play as Luca, the host, and Rehm, her less-than-cooperative counterpart, as they explore a quarantined city ripped apart and flooded by an interdimensional catastrophe. Their only hope of survival is by learning to co-exist.

Possessor(s) takes place across the interconnected sprawl of a destroyed mega-city, from collapsed skyscrapers to an abandoned aquarium, all riddled with secrets. Hauntingly beautiful 3D environments form a stunning backdrop over which hand-drawn and animated characters, and mysterious sci-fi horror action take center stage.

Choose multiple paths in an open-ended world structure as you look to uncover the truth behind the catastrophe. Meet a cast of engaging characters, each with their own heart-breaking story to follow in the aftermath of the devastation.

Gameplay is centered around tight, fast-paced platforming with a range of unique movement abilities that extends to its tense, precise, combat. Balance ground and air attacks, replete with combos and juggles as you encounter a variety of deadly enemies and challenging bosses. Find and unlock a wide array of powerful weapons and upgrades to bolster your arsenal and explore previously inaccessible areas.

name: Tenjutsu
description:
In Tenjutsu, you play as a renegade yakuza hellbent on defying her former associates and loosening their grip on the Secret Garden City. Revealed at this year's Devolver Direct, this fast and fluid rogue-jutsu is the latest game from Sébastien Benard, designer of the acclaimed Dead Cells.

Four powerful crime syndicates control the city, ruling with an iron fist. To defeat them, you must master a brutal brawling system and build a diverse arsenal of weapons, upgrades, and martial arts techniques, breaking their hold on the streets in a flurry of violence.

The city is reborn as these sinister organizations fall to your fists, tackled in any order you wish. The ruined streets become vibrant and full of life, and you can spend gathered resources in shops and restaurants to help you on your quest.

Shape the city to fit your play style, unlocking new weapons, combat moves, and new areas. Just don't take too long: the longer you spend preparing, the stronger your enemies will become.

name: Tides of Tomorrow
description: From the makers of Road 96, Tides of Tomorrow challenges you to survive the troubled ocean planet of Elynd, as well as the choices made by your friends and favourite streamers.

name: Petal Runner
description: Hop on your bike and join Cali & Kira as they explore the sun-soaked city of Sapphire Valley and train to become Petal Runners! Make deliveries, meet new friends, play minigames, and discover a wholesome slice-of-life story about growing up and letting go.

name: Mossfield Archives
description: A game about building and exploring connections.

name: Battle Aces
description:
Welcome to a fast paced and action-oriented real time strategy game where you defend your base, advance your tech and attack the enemy’s core. Battle Aces is a RTS game made for everyone, for those new to the genre or longtime fans, as well.

Customize a specific Unit Deck before each match, limited to 10 minutes, making for intense battles, full of strategic depth at its highest levels of play.

name: Rogue Eclipse
description: A spacefighter for the new age. Master your piloting prowess in an epic sci-fi setting, take down swarms of starfighters, merciless armadas and colossal behemoths in a roguelike campaign that spans the cosmos. Easy to learn, tricky to master, and impossible to put down.

name: Battle Suit Aces
description: Lead a plucky crew against a star-consuming threat in this charming character-driven, card battling RPG. Brought to you by the creators of the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade, recruit ace pilots, upgrade their mecha Battle Suits, grow meaningful friendships and captain your personalized adventure.

name: Project C
The Simulation
description: A never-before-seen horror game is the only evidence found at a crime scene. As a retired game designer hired to investigate the case, you find a hidden mode that plunges you into a rabbit hole of the unknown. As more obscure games are uncovered, cross the fourth wall of their worlds and investigate terrifying truths that transcend their own reality...

name: Sleep Awake
description: First-person psychedelic horror set in the far future. In the last known city on Earth, people are disappearing in their sleep. Those who remain exist in a crisis of reckless experiments to keep awake. Katja must navigate depraved death cults, otherworldly forces, and the ever-present horror of The HUSH, to save herself and those who rely upon her.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Elena
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolfhound
description: Infiltrate a mysterious Axis base in the Bermuda Triangle as one-man army Capt. Chuck “WOLFHOUND” Rossetti. Explore the deadly island and uncover the Nazi's twisted scientific pursuits while wreaking havoc on their forces and horrific creations in this sci-fi WWII Metroidvania!

name: Witch of Oblivion
description: Witch of Oblivion is a sorcerous souls-like set in an enchanting open world. Explore an ever-changing forest and wield destructive fire magic responsibly: scorch hordes of enemies and reshape the environment, but overdo it and the wild flames may cause irreversible damage.

name: Messages From The Universe Graveyard
description: Explore a dead MMO and leave messages for other players to find.

name: Cellular City
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Polished
description: Clean ‘em up, Beat ‘em up, Keep ‘em up in whatever order you see fit. Jet around with a hose, shoot worms with a shotgun, or throw bleach bombs to clean whole sections at a time. Just remember, you’re on the clock.

name: Dungeon Master
description: In Dungeon Master, you either try to escape a randomly generated dungeon as a survivor or hunt down survivors as the Dungeon Master. It's a cross-platform game where your role determines your goal.

name: Lucy Grace
description: Embark on a chilling journey into the depths of the mind of Lucy Grace, a psychological horror indie adventure.

name: Rainbow Valley
description: After getting lost in a blizzard you find yourself in Rainbow Valley—a strange mountain with even stranger villagers.

name: Soviet Zombies
description: Soviet Zombie is a thrilling and immersive zombie survival horror game that transports players back to the mysterious atmosphere of the 1980s to 1990s Soviet Union. This game offers a unique and experience as you navigate the harrowing world of post-apocalyptic horrors set in the Eastern Bloc.

name: Trams, Trains & Monorails
description: Trams, Trains & Monorails is a strategic Hex tile puzzle game. Guide the development of your own city, connecting stations and districts and completing the mini goals. Watch your city come alive as it develops industries, tourism and lost motorists.

name: Doomed Stars
description: Consume the civilization of the fools who unleashed you upon the universe.

name: Shooting Range Simulator
description: Run your own shooting range! Sell ammo, rent weapons, and manage upgrades to grow your business. Buy supplies online, attract customers, and aim for success. Can you build the ultimate shooting range? Find out in Shooting Range Simulator!

name: Evil Doll
description: Evil Doll is a survival horror game, where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned house with a demonic-looking doll. With five days to escape, you must solve puzzles while evading the murderous Evil Doll. Will you survive?

name: World of Magic: Rise of Magic
description: Embark on an epic journey as a mage. Defend cities from threats, lead assaults on fortified walls, and master a variety of powerful spells. Upgrade your magical abilities to become the greatest sorcerer and defeat armies of both humans and mythical creatures.

name: Omega Space
description: Ω-SPACE - The last dimension you can reach

name: Politics The Game
description: Become a parliamentarian, create a powerful party, and lead it to victory in this humorous RPG. Manage your popularity and dignity, use unique powers, and navigate a storyline inspired by current events.

name: Cube Arena
description: Ever wanted to play Legue of Legends or DOTA but in First person mode? Now you can! PVP with your friends or Co-op with them against Bots. Also you can play it on Oculus Quest by downloading it in meta store

name: Just A Dream
description: "just a dream" is a realistic first-person walking simulator in the style of a body-cam, presenting a psychological horror experience based on the aesthetics of liminal spaces.

name: Dreamians: Card Battle
description: Dreamians: Card Battle is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with creatures that can evolve and change the course of battles unexpectedly. Play with one of the 3 main characters and face epic battles using over a hundred cards to save the dream world.

name: The Monastery
description: Do you miss classic survival horror games? Here you will find a classic mansion, riddles, a mysterious atmosphere and references to the good old games.

name: Elementers
description: Level-up, unlock new abilities and elements to equip and try out in Co-op Pve Missions or Pvp.

name: NebuLeet
description: A tactical auto-battler with programming: design and program combat vessels, research new technologies, colonize planets, and defeat enemies in space and on planets!

name: Curiosmos
description: Curiosmos is a whimsical cosmic sandbox game where you build your own solar system by hand, crafting planets, moons, gravity, atmosphere, and even life! Embark on a quest to discover the secrets of the universe!

name: Synthaar
description: Synthaar is a game where Life Simulation meets Grand Strategy. Create your legacy, build your home, business, base and beyond, and accumulate power and wealth to ensure your descendants have a prosperous future under your care.

name: BrainZ Defender
description: Unleash chaos in BrainZ Defender, the ultimate tower defense FPS! Freeze, burn, and electrocute hordes of relentless zombies with deadly traps and weapons. Strategize your defenses, protect the Brain, and survive the undead apocalypse as you fight to secure humanity's future!

name: Slime Survivors
description: 《Slime Survivors》 is a casual bullet heaven game, where you can indulge in mowing down enemies in the monster-infested ocean, collecting rewards, and upgrading weapons to become a terrifying killing machine in this fantastical realm.

name: Blonsters
description: Blonsters is a fast-paced Roguelite FPS with an emphasis on run variation and randomization. Use high-powered weapons and perks to battle your way through hordes of randomized creatures in unique environments as you slay deadly bosses to claim victory.

name: The Beyond Of Fears: New House
description: Focuses on the mysterious events surrounding a woman trying to build a calm and peaceful life in the absence of her husband.

name: Spyrit Walker
description: A Weird Western world trapped in a perpetual night. You must fight to survive, rescue strange characters, unlock powerful weapons and abilities in hopes of ridding this land of EVIL. Explore the open world and complete objectives in any order you like alone or in CO-OP as a SPYRIT WALKER!

name: Elfie
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to have an elephant the size of a softball as a friend? Elfie is a hybrid genre game that answers just that! Enjoy the company of your new rotund friend and partake in her hobbies represented by a collection of minigames.

name: Colorpicker
description: Party game alone or with friends, grab, hit objects, or push your opponents to get the highest score and become the grand winner!

name: Ghost Party
description: Open world RPG inspired by Dungeons & Dragons and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney. Explore, fight, gather evidence and solve mysteries in a fantasy realm of ghosts & magic. Choose how you Interact with the world & its inhabitants. Fight or logically reason your way out of a battle. The choice is yours.

name: Sea of Radiation: Ready
description: You will play an ordinary fish that accumulates radiation and mutates in a sea area flooded with nuclear pollution. Attacking and devouring is the only way for you to grow. Defeat other monsters and eventually become the sole overlord of this ocean.

name: Mega Giga Cookie Destroyer TD
description: Get ready for an epic pixel art showdown ! Dive into the heart of tower defense chaos as you battle against scrumptious calorie-packed enemies, all on massive, sprawling maps. With an extensive arsenal of towers at your disposal, it's time to defend against the ultimate sweet tooth invasion!

name: Undead Trail: Haunting Shadows
description: Play as a lone survivor in a creepy mansion overrun by zombies. Fight, solve puzzles, and hide to stay alive. Created by a single developer, this passion project promises a top-tier horror experience.

name: Rush Delivery
description: Another Zombie Survivors

name: 1 AM Moscow Time
description: A 2D adventure about rescuing magical creatures in Moscow and the role of a design bureau employee in this whole story.

name: M.I.N.S.K.
description: In a world on the brink of extinction, survivors hide from a toxic fog. Control a robot explorer, delving into abandoned cities to find essential survival resources

name: Stuntboost
description: Race against time on tracks of cardboard and toys to break records, climb leaderboards and become the fastest skater your online-neighborhood has ever seen!

name: Cats in Wonderland
description: The Queen of Hearts had a fit of rage after the Cheshire Cat refused to be her pet and ordered the capture of all the cats in Wonderland. Find them before her and prevent anything bad from happening.

name: Catto's Post Office
description: Deliver mail as Catto, the town's dedicated Postcat, while meeting new and old friends in a vibrant cozy town filled with kitty residents.

name: Loco Limbo
description: Hello, I'm Loco Limbo, waking up on an island after some crazy military experiments. Now, I can detach my own limbs and control 'em like puppets.Can I make it off this crazy island in one piece?

name: Lumm-e
description: Guide Lumm-e in this charming 2D puzzle game. Use your flashlight to grow mushrooms into platforms, lights, and elevators. Solve puzzles to heal the world's disease in a relaxing, game jam-winning adventure. No precision platforming required!
